attributes.action: if a member of our armed forces is killed on active duty.they must be paid 4 the hole of there tour.
attributes.additional_details: if a soldier is killed on active service he/she must be paid for the hole of there tour of duty.even if they are killed on there 1st day.so if your tour is 18 months & you get killed on your 1st day.you get paid 4 the hole 18 months.our armed forces deserve this.
